HomePage.headline: Discover Your Luxury Escape in Hua Hin
HomePage.subtitle: A Grand Residence with Private Pool and Unbeatable Location
HomePage.title: Welcome to Our Exclusive Villa
HomePage.description: Escape to a private oasis on a sprawling 1 rai estate, just moments from the vibrant heart of Hua Hin and stunning beaches. Our warm yet grand residence offers unparalleled privacy and a gateway to the best of Thailand's coast.

cta.headline: Ready to Plan Your Dream Holiday?

guestHouseOnly.title: Guest House Only
guestHouseOnly.description: Perfect for small families or couples, enjoy our cozy 2-bedroom guest house with private entrance.

guestHousePool.title: Guest House with Pool Access
guestHousePool.description: Experience our guest house with the added luxury of pool access during your stay.

mainHouse.title: Main Villa
mainHouse.description: Indulge in our luxurious 3-bedroom main villa with private pool and spacious living areas.

fullProperty.title: Complete Property
fullProperty.description: Perfect for large groups, enjoy exclusive access to both the main villa and guest house.

villa.title: Enjoy the main Villa
villa.description: The main Villa features 3 bedrooms, a large pool, and a spacious living area perfect for your family holiday.

guesthouse.title: Our guest house
guesthouse.description: The Villa comes with it's own guest house with 2 bedrooms for those extra guests.
